H0.text: where does the electron transport chain pumps protons. Into the mitochondrial matrix

H1.text: where does the electron transport chain pumps protons. Through the cell wall

H2.text: where does the electron transport chain pumps protons. Along the cytoskeleton

H3.text: where does the electron transport chain pumps protons. across a membrane

A4.text: The energy is used to generate a proton gradient across the mitochondrial membrane by 'pumping' protons into the intermembrane space.

A5.text: Protons can be physically moved across a membrane, as seen in mitochondrial Complexes I and IV.
